title: Beth-hoglah
html: BETH-HOGLAH(Beth-hogʹlah).A Benjamite border town situated in the southeastern corner of this tribe’s territory and on the boundary between Benjamin and Judah. (Jos 15:1, 6; 18:11, 19, 21) Scholars generally locate Beth-hoglah near ʽEin Hajla, about 8 km (5 mi) SE of Jericho.
